pages.text: Radiation Shielding Units will allow your MekaSuit armor piece to protect you from radiation, similar to the $(l:item/equipment/hazmat_suit)Hazmat Suit$(/l). $(p)Note that once you have been exposed to deadly doses of radiation without protection and began taking damage, wearing MekaSuit armor pieces with Radiation Shielding Units

installed will $(bold)not$() prevent you from taking damage. Instead, it will only prevent the increase of radiation dosage.$(p)In addition, all of your MekaSuit armor pieces must have a Radiation Shielding Unit installed for full protection against radiation.$(p)Max units per armor piece: 1
